text: a wisconsin woman recently convicted of killing her daughter more than 50 years ago is an ` evil monster ' who deserves to die in prison , said her adult son , who claims he suffered years of horrific abuse at his mother 's hands . ruby c. klokow , 76 , of sheboygan , pleaded no contest in february to second-degree murder in the 1957 death of her 6-month-old daughter , jeaneen . but as part of a plea agreement , prosecutors have agreed to recommend a sentence of 45 days in jail and 10 years ' probation , citing her age and medical issues . scroll down to watch interview . brother 's
